name: secret-key
effect:
Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV
:   Unlocks the secret rotom room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom's form.
short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom's appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
The key to the
CINNABAR ISLAND
GYM’s entrance.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The key to CINNABAR ISLAND GYM’s
front door. It is colored red and
decorated.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a special
electric signal to open a door.
